Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our innovative team.

**Key Responsibilities:**
• Design and develop scalable web applications
• Lead technical discussions and architectural decisions  
• Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
• Collaborate with product managers and designers
• Implement CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices

**What We Offer:**
• Competitive salary with equity options
• Flexible work arrangements and remote options
• Professional development budget ($3,000/year)
• Health, dental, and vision insurance
• Unlimited PTO policy

Join us in building the next generation of enterprise software solutions!
Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience; 5+ years of full-stack development experience; Proficiency in React, Node.js, and TypeScript; Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure); Strong database design skills; Excellent communication and leadership abilities

Description:
Exciting opportunity for a Digital Marketing Manager to drive growth for our diverse portfolio of clients!

**Your Impact:**
• Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies
• Manage multi-channel campaigns (SEO, PPC, Social Media)
• Analyze performance metrics and optimize campaigns  
• Lead client presentations and strategy sessions
• Coordinate with creative and development teams

**Benefits Package:**
• 100% remote work environment
• Stock options in a fast-growing agency
• $2,000 annual learning & development budget
• Top-tier health insurance coverage
• Quarterly team retreats in amazing locations

Ready to make a real impact? Apply today!
Requirements: Bachelor's in Marketing, Communications, or related field; 3+ years of digital marketing experience; Proven track record with Google Ads and Facebook advertising; Strong analytical skills with experience in GA4 and marketing automation; Excellent project management and communication skills

Description:
Join our data science team as a Junior Data Scientist and help transform raw data into actionable business insights!

**Learning Opportunities:**
• Work with petabyte-scale datasets from Fortune 500 clients
• Build machine learning models for predictive analytics
• Create data visualizations and interactive dashboards
• Present findings to C-level executives  
• Collaborate with senior data scientists and engineers

**Growth-Focused Environment:**
• Structured mentorship program with senior team members
• Access to cutting-edge tools and technologies
• Conference attendance and certification support
• Clear career progression pathway to Senior Data Scientist
• Innovation time (20% of work week for personal projects)

Perfect role for recent graduates or career changers looking to break into data science!
Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field; Experience with Python and R for data analysis; Knowledge of SQL and database systems; Familiarity with machine learning libraries (scikit-learn, pandas); Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail; Excellent presentation skills
